value.title: How to Change Joining Types in Power BI and Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are combining tables in Power BI or Excel using Power Query, you might wonder how you change the join or merge type. In this video, I talked about it. value.title: How to Create a Date or Calendar Table and Dimension in Power BI using Power Query

value.title: How to modify a linked entity in Power BI dataflows
value.excerpt: It is not possible to change a linked entity in a dataflow in Power BI. Linked entities has to be modified only in the dataflow in which they are created.
